title: Declutter Weekend Reset
description: A practical, low-stress declutter you can actually finish.
steps: Pick one small zone (one drawer, one bench, one corner)
Set up 4 piles: Keep / Donate / Bin / Unsure
Do a quick surface sweep (no organising yet)
Empty one drawer/shelf and sort quickly
Put donate items by the door
Stop at a natural break point and celebrate the win

title: Morning Routine (7-year-old)
steps: Night before: pack bag + choose clothes
Shoes on + bag by the door
